# Example 10 -  Deep Feature Search Complex Sum#
<br>
Goal: Complex Sum
<br>

Target = (f_1 * Math.log(1.0 + f_1) + f_2 + f_3 + f_4) / 5
<br>
Noise = values(f_5 -> f_7) noise random int in 1 to 100

```{r, eval=TRUE, results='asis'}
complexSum = getData("complexSum")
print(xtable(head(complexSum,n=5)), type='html', comment=F)
```
```{r complexSum_example, eval=TRUE, message=FALSE, results='hide'}
complexSumModel = learn(projectName = "complexSum",
        trainData = complexSum,
        target = "tgt",
				featureGenerationCtrl = featureGenerationControl(
						maxFeaturesCount = 100,
						maxFeatureDuration= 5
		 		),
				modelBuildingCtrl = modelBuildingControl(
						algorithmsWhiteList = list("RandomForestRegressor")
				),
        autoSave = FALSE
    )
```
```{r, eval=TRUE, echo=TRUE, cache=FALSE}
complexSumModel$evaluate()$evaluation$rootMeanSquaredError
```

```{r complexSumPoly_example, eval=TRUE, message=FALSE, results='hide'}
complexSumAdvancedModel = learn(
					projectName = "complexSumAdvanced",
          trainData = complexSum,
          target = "tgt",
					featureGenerationCtrl = featureGenerationControl(
								featureSearchMode = "DIG_DEEP",
								maxFeaturesCount = 100,
								maxFeatureDuration=5
					),
								modelBuildingCtrl = modelBuildingControl(
								algorithmsWhiteList = list("RandomForestRegressor")
					),
          autoSave = FALSE
		)
```

```{r, eval=TRUE, results='asis'}
library(xtable)
print(xtable(complexSumAdvancedModel$features()[1:5,c("idx","feature")]), type='html', comment=F) 
```
```{r, eval=TRUE, echo=TRUE, cache=FALSE}
complexSumAdvancedModel$evaluate()$evaluation$rootMeanSquaredError
```
